General.Name: Shenzhen Tagen Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Tagen Group Co., Ltd. primarily engages in the urban construction, comprehensive development, and urban service businesses in China. The company offers construction services in the fields of municipal engineering, construction engineering, rail transit engineering, road maintenance, etc. It also develops real estate projects, including medium and high-end residences, affordable housing, office buildings, hotels, urban complexes, industrial parks, etc. In addition, the company undertakes daily operation and maintenance of highways, bridges, and tunnels; provides architectural design, property management, and shed reform services. Further, it operates sewage treatment plants and pipe projects; builds smart city; and offers engineering services, as well as acts as a construction agent. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Tonge (Group) Co., Ltd. Shenzhen Tagen Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
